I fixed up the NoClassDefFoundError issue.  It was a missing package import that somehow slipped by.  Ultimately the tests run and all pass except for the pack200 test.  Now the unpack result is coming back empty (size 0) whereas it should be 13K or so. I did a bit of initial investigation and ended up finding that we are getting -1 back from unpack200.exe.  Running the same command directly from the command line there is a brief message about a "short header" or some such.  My interpretation here is that the packed file included in the original patch did no survive the patch process and the binary form got munged somehow.  

I will dig up an unmodified packed file tomorrow.  Or, if Stefan can attach the original pack.gz file here as a binary attachment, I can commit it.  Actually, it would be cool to try the tests first with the new file...

Created an attachment (id=77206)
original test data as a binary attachment

Here is the original as a binary attachment
Thanks. That certainly fixed the problem.  I have committed the test data.
